summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AutoPièces marketplace. Backend APIs are fully functional (26/26 tests passed), but critical frontend issues found on listings pages preventing proper functionality.

critical_bugs.issue: React Select component error - Select.Item requires non-empty value prop
critical_bugs.error_details: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string. This prevents listings pages from loading properly.

ui_bugs.issue: Name field validation error - 'Please fill out this field' appears even when field is filled

passed_tests: Pricing page display with all 4 packages
Pricing page buy button authentication check
Authentication page loading and tab switching
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Select component error on listings pages. The Select.Item components in the filter dropdowns need non-empty value props. This is blocking all listings functionality. Also fix registration form name field validation issue.

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (critical listings pages broken, other pages working)
